channel.title: Anniversary on Dheepak's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Anniversary on Dheepak's blog

item.title: 3 Years of Data, Deadlines and Growth
item.description:
I’ve been reading the blogs for some years now. I came across the annual reviews on the FreeFinCal site; it’s a shame I couldn’t recall the exact year. My guess would be somewhere between 2018 and 2020.

During the pandemic, I started subscribing to the Substacks. I noticed almost everyone who is regularly writing is reviewing the annual performance. And I always wanted to write one for myself. The birthdays, New Year’s Eves, and financial year-endâ€”all of them provided a chance to write. All these days were an opportunity to sit down and look back at what has happened.
